languages.text: Разобравшись с Адептус Арбитес, Соломон Антар стал личной ищейкой Вольного Торговца. Когда {name} фон Валанциус хотел{mf||а} отыскать кого-то, по следу отправлялся Соломон со своим верным псом. Никто не мог скрыться от них, и челюсти Глейто работали без устали, разрывая врагов династии. Когда в тело кибермастифа вселился демон, привлеченный убийствами и яростью его владельца, Антар лишь криво усмехнулся, довольный, что его зверь стал еще смертоноснее, еще непобедимее.

Having dealt with the Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne Anthar became the Rogue Trader's personal investigator. Whenever {name} von Valancius wanted to track someone down, {mf|he|she} would send Solomorne and his faithful dog. There was no hiding from them, and Glaito's jaws were relentless in tearing apart the dynasty's enemies. When the cyber-mastiff's body became possessed by a daemon lured there by his master's devastating fury, Anthar merely smiled a wry smile, pleased that his beast was now even more deadly and invincible than before.
languages.original_text: Разобравшись с Адептус Арбитес, Соломон Антар стал личной ищейкой Вольного Торговца. Когда {name} фон Валанциус хотел{mf||а} отыскать кого-то, по следу отправлялся Соломон со своим верным псом. Никто не мог скрыться от них, и челюсти Глейто работали без устали, разрывая врагов династии. Когда в тело кибермастифа вселился демон, привлеченный убийствами и яростью его владельца, Антар лишь криво усмехнулся, довольный, что его зверь стал еще смертоноснее, еще непобедимее.

traits.locale_text: Having dealt with the Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne Anthar became the Rogue Trader's personal sleuth. Whenever {name} von Valancius wanted to track someone down, {mf|he|she} would send Solomorne and his faithful dog. There was no hiding from them, and Glaito's jaws were relentless in tearing apart the dynasty's enemies. When the cyber-mastiff's body was possessed by a demon lured by his master's murderous fury, Anthar merely smiled a wry smile, pleased that his beast was now even deadlier and more invincible.

Whenever {name} von Valancius wanted to track someone down, {mf|he|she} would send Solomorne and his faithful dog. There was no hiding from them, and Glaito's jaws were relentless in tearing apart the dynasty's enemies. When the cyber-mastiff's body became possessed by a daemon lured there by his master's devastating fury, Anthar merely smiled a wry smile, pleased that his beast was now even more deadly and invincible than before.

languages.text: Nachdem er mit den Adeptus Arbites abgeschlossen hatte, wurde Solomorne Anthar der persönliche Ermittler {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Wann immer {name} von Valancius jemanden ausfindig machen wollte, entsandte {mf|er|sie} Solomorne und seinen treuen Hund. Niemand konnte sich vor ihnen verstecken, und Glaitos Zähne zerrissen gnadenlos die Feinde der Dynastie. Wenn der Körper des Cyber-Mastiffs von einem Dämon besessen wurde, den der vernichtende Zorn seines Herren heraufbeschwor, lächelte Anthar nur trocken – zufrieden, dass seine Bestie nun noch tödlicher und unbesiegbarer war als zuvor.
languages.original_text: Having dealt with the Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne Anthar became the Rogue Trader's personal investigator. Whenever {name} von Valancius wanted to track someone down, {mf|he|she} would send Solomorne and his faithful dog. There was no hiding from them, and Glaito's jaws were relentless in tearing apart the dynasty's enemies. When the cyber-mastiff's body became possessed by a daemon lured there by his master's devastating fury, Anthar merely smiled a wry smile, pleased that his beast was now even more deadly and invincible than before.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem er mit den Adeptus Arbites abgeschlossen hatte, wurde Solomorne Anthar der persönliche Ermittler {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Wann immer {name} von Valancius jemanden ausfindig machen wollte, entsandte {mf|er|sie} Solomorne und seinen treuen Hund. Niemand konnte sich vor ihnen verstecken, und Glaitos Zähne zerrissen gnadenlos die Feinde der Dynastie. Wenn der Körper des Cyber-Mastiffs von einem Dämon besessen wurde, den der vernichtende Zorn seines Herren heraufbeschwor, lächelte Anthar nur trocken – zufrieden, dass seine Bestie nun noch tödlicher und unbesiegbarer war als zuvor.

languages.text: Après s'être occupé de l'Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne Anthar devint l'enquêteur personnel {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Chaque fois que {name} von Valancius voulait retrouver quelqu'un, {mf|il|elle} envoyait Solomorne et son fidèle compagnon à quatre pattes. Nul ne pouvait leur échapper, et les mâchoires de Glaito mettaient implacablement en pièces les ennemis de la dynastie. Lorsque le corps du cyber-mastiff fut possédé par un démon attiré par la fureur dévastatrice de son maître, Anthar se contenta d'un sourire en coin, ravi que son acolyte devienne encore plus redoutable et invincible qu'avant.
languages.original_text: Having dealt with the Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne Anthar became the Rogue Trader's personal investigator. Whenever {name} von Valancius wanted to track someone down, {mf|he|she} would send Solomorne and his faithful dog. There was no hiding from them, and Glaito's jaws were relentless in tearing apart the dynasty's enemies. When the cyber-mastiff's body became possessed by a daemon lured there by his master's devastating fury, Anthar merely smiled a wry smile, pleased that his beast was now even more deadly and invincible than before.

Chaque fois que {name} von Valancius voulait retrouver quelqu'un, {mf|il|elle} envoyait Solomorne et son fidèle compagnon à quatre pattes. Nul ne pouvait leur échapper, et les mâchoires de Glaito mettaient implacablement en pièces les ennemis de la dynastie. Lorsque le corps du cyber-mastiff fut possédé par un démon attiré par la fureur dévastatrice de son maître, Anthar se contenta d'un sourire en coin, ravi que son acolyte devienne encore plus redoutable et invincible qu'avant.

languages.text: 解决了法务部的事情之后，索罗蒙·安萨成为了行商浪人的私人调查员。每当{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯打算除掉什么人时，{mf|他|她}都会派遣索罗蒙与他忠诚的生化獒犬解决问题。王朝的敌人无处遁形，被格雷托一个接一个撕成了碎片。后来，当某只恶魔被索罗蒙的狂怒吸引而来，占据了格雷托的躯体时，索罗蒙仅仅露出了冰冷的笑容，庆幸他的狗变得更加凶狠，更加所向披靡。
languages.original_text: Having dealt with the Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne Anthar became the Rogue Trader's personal investigator. Whenever {name} von Valancius wanted to track someone down, {mf|he|she} would send Solomorne and his faithful dog. There was no hiding from them, and Glaito's jaws were relentless in tearing apart the dynasty's enemies. When the cyber-mastiff's body became possessed by a daemon lured there by his master's devastating fury, Anthar merely smiled a wry smile, pleased that his beast was now even more deadly and invincible than before.

解决了法务部的事情之后，索罗蒙·安萨成为了行商浪人的私人调查员。每当{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯打算除掉什么人时，{mf|他|她}都会派遣索罗蒙与他忠诚的生化獒犬解决问题。王朝的敌人无处遁形，被格雷托一个接一个撕成了碎片。后来，当某只恶魔被索罗蒙的狂怒吸引而来，占据了格雷托的躯体时，索罗蒙仅仅露出了冰冷的笑容，庆幸他的狗变得更加凶狠，更加所向披靡。

languages.text: Tras lidiar con el Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne Anthar se convirtió en el investigador personal de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Cada vez que {name} von Valancius quería localizar a alguien, enviaba a Solomorne y a su fiel sabueso. Nadie podía ocultarse de ellos, y las mandíbulas de Glaito trituraron sin piedad a los enemigos de la dinastía. Cuando el cuerpo del cibermastín fue poseído por un daemon, atraído por la furia devastadora de su amo, Anthar se limitó a sonreír, satisfecho de que su bestia fuera aún más letal e invencible que antes.
languages.original_text: Having dealt with the Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne Anthar became the Rogue Trader's personal investigator. Whenever {name} von Valancius wanted to track someone down, {mf|he|she} would send Solomorne and his faithful dog. There was no hiding from them, and Glaito's jaws were relentless in tearing apart the dynasty's enemies. When the cyber-mastiff's body became possessed by a daemon lured there by his master's devastating fury, Anthar merely smiled a wry smile, pleased that his beast was now even more deadly and invincible than before.

traits.locale_text: Tras lidiar con el Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne Anthar se convirtió en el investigador personal de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Cada vez que {name} von Valancius quería localizar a alguien, enviaba a Solomorne y a su fiel sabueso. Nadie podía ocultarse de ellos, y las mandíbulas de Glaito trituraron sin piedad a los enemigos de la dinastía. Cuando el cuerpo del cibermastín fue poseído por un daemon, atraído por la furia devastadora de su amo, Anthar se limitó a sonreír, satisfecho de que su bestia fuera aún más letal e invencible que antes.

languages.text: 高等裁定局を制した後、ソロモーン・アンサールはローグトレーダーの個人調査官となった。{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスが誰かを追跡したい時は、必ずソロモーンと忠実な犬を送り出した。彼らから逃れることは不可能であり、グライトの顎は王朝の敵を容赦なく引き裂いた。サイバーマスチフの体が、主人の激しい怒りに惹かれたディーモンに取り憑かれた時も、アンサールはただ苦笑いを浮かべただけだった。彼の獣が以前にも増して凶暴で無敵になったことを喜んでいたのだ。
languages.original_text: Having dealt with the Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne Anthar became the Rogue Trader's personal investigator. Whenever {name} von Valancius wanted to track someone down, {mf|he|she} would send Solomorne and his faithful dog. There was no hiding from them, and Glaito's jaws were relentless in tearing apart the dynasty's enemies. When the cyber-mastiff's body became possessed by a daemon lured there by his master's devastating fury, Anthar merely smiled a wry smile, pleased that his beast was now even more deadly and invincible than before.

traits.locale_text: 高等裁定局を制した後、ソロモーン・アンサールはローグトレーダーの個人調査官となった。{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスが誰かを追跡したい時は、必ずソロモーンと忠実な犬を送り出した。彼らから逃れることは不可能であり、グライトの顎は王朝の敵を容赦なく引き裂いた。サイバーマスチフの体が、主人の激しい怒りに惹かれたディーモンに取り憑かれた時も、アンサールはただ苦笑いを浮かべただけだった。彼の獣が以前にも増して凶暴で無敵になったことを喜んでいたのだ。

languages.text: Adeptus Arbites defterini kapatan Solomorne Anthar, Hür Tacir'in şahsi tetkikçisi oldu. {name} von Valancius ne zaman birinin peşine düşmek istese Solomorne'u ve sadık köpeğini görevlendirirdi. Bu ikiliden kaçıp sıyrılmak mümkün değildi. Glaito, hanedanlığın düşmanlarını bıçak kadar keskin dişleriyle amansızca paramparça etmekten geri durmazdı. Siber mastifin bedeni efendisinin yıkıcı hiddetiyle vücudunun derinliklerine çekilen bir iblis tarafından ele geçirildiğinde Anthar, köpeğinin artık eskisinden de daha ölümcül ve yenilmez olmasını yalnızca kırık bir gülümsemeyle karşıladı.
